page.title: 11The Lee Parish Council
page.content: {Organisation}7 unpaid councillors elected every 4 years & a paid clerk. Meetings held in public every other month. Chrmn Andrew Stacey BBC Sound Director,V.Chrmn Dr Ronald Wicker Chemical Research Mgr (Rtd), Cllrs Susan Cowdy OBE Naturalist, Ecologist, Barbara Nelson Travel Tour Operator (Rtd), Frank Pearce Painter, Decorator (Rtd), Geoffrey Rutland Plumber (Rtd) & Derrick Worsfold Heating Engineer. Clerk Bernard Clarke Solicitor (Rtd). {Responsibilities}include care of allotments, recreation ground, war memorial & 5 public seats & commenting on planning to Chiltern DC, ensuring that landowners obey law re footpaths & reporting road damage & protruding hedges to Bucks CC or residents. {Resources}Precept on local rate, now Â£660 or .7p/Â£ & allotment rents. {Current Project}Children's playgound
